version_description:
This is a minor update where we made some improvements and fixed rare bugs.

- Ability to skip some monologues;
- New screen with additions;
- Other improvements.

The release of free DLC "Time" will take place on 24th of November. Do not rush to delete the game! :)

The Secret Elevator Remastered, you play the protagonist a detective send to a unknown house which opens new dimensions and mysteries to solve.

Patch 2.0 we've have made numerous changes.

- Advanced story plot;
- Improved graphics;
- Puzzles and interaction;
- Optimization;
- DLC Time is free.

And much more.

Download the update and plunge into the mysterious story of The Secret Elevator.

Patch 2.0.1

- Minor improvements

***

Patch 2.0 we've have made numerous changes.

- Advanced story plot;
- Improved graphics;
- Puzzles and interaction;
- Optimization;
- DLC Time is free.

And much more.

Download the update and plunge into the mysterious story of The Secret Elevator.

We've added the interactive teaser for the new DLC "Survival" for The Secret Elevator!

###---###

You've awoken in a locked room, where there is only one way out. The door was opened.
Do you dare step out?

###---###

In our latest patch 2.0.5 we've added a number of other important changes.

- 19 atmospheric stickers;
- Graphical and technical improvements;
- Fixed bugs;
- Improved sound and music;
- Updated screen training;


###---###

If you have any problems with the game, contact us on an official page FaceBook:

https://www.facebook.com/TheSecretElevator

###---###

We love our game and aspire to make it better.

Thank you!

- Bugs fixed;
- Added Chinese language (We are grateful to the player Yifei Liu).

In this update, we made the game a little better.

- French and German languages support is added (Experiment);
- Fixed minor bugs;
- Improved performance;
- Improved lighting
Patch 2.1.8 brought one small correction into the game.

Now The Secret Elevator is optimized for iPhone X screen!
Also in this patch we have changed the interface, fixed some bugs and made small improvements.

Thank you for playing our game!

The world of The Secret Elevator has got one small hint and a few minor fixes.
Thank you for playing our game!

— UI fix for iPhone X;
— Bug fixes.
